articles.title: Sudarshan Venu takes over as Managing Director of TVS Motor Company - Moneycontrol
articles.description: His elevation coincides with the appointment of Prof Sir Ralf Dieter Speth as the Chairman of the company.
articles.content:
Sudarshan Venu, son of Venu Srinivasan, has taken over as the Managing Director of TVS Motor Company.
Until yesterday, he was the Joint Managing Director of the company.
